oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED button documentation with some components
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
• Inherited icon-only components in all button types
• Group button components (ready-to-use)
• Button Constraints
• Button Types
• Usage Guidelines
• Renamed Icon names
• Fab Button (large & medium)
• New light/dark theme color added to the palette
• Box shadow removal from all button types

oldVersionHistory.label: FIXED button styles and added button groups
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
• Updated button styles with removed shadows, although shadow versions still exists.
• Added button-group (segmented buttons) for secondary & tertiary styles.
• Edited link styles.
• Updated main index into categories, and added buttons.
• Added introductions to all the versions of buttons.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED button component to the library
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
• Button Component Page
• Button Types (Primary, Secondary, Default, Success, Danger & Link)
• Changed elevation 100 & 200 styles.

oldVersionHistory.label: FIXED structure of component pages and added accessibility guidelines to all other components
oldVersionHistory.description:
Whats included in this version:
• Added "_Neutrals" shades & tints to the library styles.
• Added accessibility guidelines & principles (if required) for all the tokens (Typography, Icons, Colors, Object Styles & Layout)
• Fixed overall canvas structure for components in terms of placement of artboards.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED introduction to layout and minor color docs
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
• Added a introduction section to layouts.
• Documentation of principles of colors.
• Added statuses on index cards.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED layouts tokens in the DS
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
• Containers
• Column Grids
• Spacer (X-Axis / Y-Axis / Both)
• Minor color changes (Light & Dark themes)
• Removed Global '_Neutral' color shades for all themes (Light & Dark)

oldVersionHistory.label: FIXED structuring of Object styles and minor color changes
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update incudes:
- Index, Leftovers & Thumb added to Object Styles.
- Replaced "Slate" color palette overall to "Neutral" palette.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED borders, elevations to object styles & neutral for light & dark theme
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
- Border Width (Object Styles)
- Elevation (Object Styles)
- Colors (Neutral for light & dark themes)
- Removed All colors palette & transparencies

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED rounding to object styles
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
- Rounding (Object Styles)
- New "Frame Header" & "Uses" component for interal DS use.
- Minor structure change of header in almost all header frames.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED color system with tests and examples
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update contains first version of finalized color system:
- 8 color palette (4 major ones).
- 5 shades, 5 tints and 1 hue.
- 12 variants of a color.
- Having similar contrast ratios for each shades.
- Transparency color.
- Usage/Creation guidelines.

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED do's don'ts for typography & icon structure
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update includes:
- Do's & Don'ts of typography
- Notes inside each frame (where relevant)
- Icon structure to icons
- Flag icons
- Few more icon categories

oldVersionHistory.label: ADDED Typography Styles
oldVersionHistory.description:
This update has all the styles and components related to typography.

- Type Faces
- Fallbacks
- Example Template
- Type Scale - Heading, Body & Code (Styles)
- Amount (Component)
- Code (Component)
